main event: In August 1957, in Wichita, Kansas, a military ground-radar observation reported a UFO at an estimated 23,000 ft. with a speed of about 500 knots. The sighting lasted for 2 minutes and involved one object exhibiting erratic changes in position.
interesting points: The UFO was estimated at a high altitude of 23,000 ft. and a speed of 500 knots.
The observation lasted for 2 minutes and was reported by military personnel.
The UFO's behavior included erratic changes in position, resembling characteristics of a balloon.
The report suggests that the UFO could have been a balloon or possibly an aircraft.
The document also includes a separate report from an aircraft sighting the UFO on the same day at 25,000 ft. with a speed of about 220 knots, further validating the sighting.
